events.text: Hey Frog! What’s going on?
Hello, Frog!
Listen, Frog. You will not believe this new game I’ve invented! You are sure to lose to me in this one! Want to hear about it?

events.question: Do you want to hear about it?

events.text:
Okay, so get this. Basically you take this inflated ball of pig skin, and you kick it around and try to get it in the other person’s goal. My vision is to have multiple people on each team, but for now it’s just us. 
The real kicker of the game, though, is that you can never use your hands! Only your feet. Crazy, right?
I-I hate to interrupt, b-but you’ve forgotten to pay me for that leather.
What? I totally forgot. I really don’t have the cash this week, Greyhound!
Come on, Raccoon. You've been trying to pull that one over us for years. Just pay Greyhound and move on.
Alright, if you insist. You can be a real stinge-lord, you know.
Thanks, Frog. You’re a real friend.

events.choice: Tell Greyhound to cut him some slack and focus on their unfinished orders.

events.text: Cut him some slack, Greyhound. The storm is coming and you have plenty of unfinished orders, including mine.
Exactly! We’ve got no time before the storm, dude. We gotta be ready.
V-v-very well. You’ll get your l-leathers.
Not now, Raccoon. Don’t you ever talk about anything serious?

I totally do, what do you mean? Listen, me and Duck were thinkin’ about the defense of the village. We think it’d be best to have our best fighters at the edge of the village, to stop the ice monsters from even getting close.

There’s an issue with that, of course. If the monsters break your line, there won’t be any good fighters left to defend the inn. Then our food will be eaten for sure! We must have a good fighter by the bunker.
Don’t you have any faith in us? Me and Frog and Duck are more than capable. Plus, its worked for us in the past.
Need I remind you that there have been two years in the past decade where we did it your way, and lost people or supplies? It doesn’t work!

events.choice: Greyhound's right, we should be cautious.

events.text: Finally, someone with an ounce of common sense. I knew you had it in you, Frog.
Wish you had a little more faith in us, Frog.

events.choice: Raccoon's right, we should be brave.

events.text: Thank you! I know we got it this time dude. Maybe we’ll even scare them away for good this year.
Hmm, if you're really that confident in the defenses, maybe we will be safe this year.
